ocr_full_text_page: will be the provider of the household" This is an absolutely unjustifiable reason to keep females illiterate. It is the women who nurture and polishes the next generation. If she herself is not educated, how will sche will ensure good brought up of her Children. As Napoleon Bonaparte has said "give me educated mothers and I will give your. excellent nation". Hence, this remains an obstacle. Secondly, females are totally reliant on their patriarchs to provide them with education. Unfortunately education is not free and requires resources to sponsers it. Even those women who work, earn very meagerly. According to World Bank report, 38% of women across the globe earn less than $ 1.9/day This figure is way below the current $4.0 poverty line. Here it is a big hurdle and women become unable to support their or their daughters' education in such low means and eventually
